QuestData.Title: Kur'talos Ravencrest
QuestData.Description: Lord Ravencrest was a fearless leader, a seasoned commander, a man of integrity and honor, a teacher, and a protector of his people.$B$BMalfurion, Illidan, Tyrande, and I... we were still young when he helped shape our destinies.$B$BThe sigil of his house was legendary. Observe, for a moment, the sigil over his former resting place and I shall tell you more of his legacy.
QuestData.RewardText: The attacking spirits spoke of their lord and master. I fear the Legion has raised Lord Ravencrest to do their bidding. What price was paid for such a sinister revival, I do not know.
